text: Early Morning Wake Up Call was Flash and the Pan's 1984 album release and was produced by Vanda and Young, the core members of the group, themselves. ==Track listing== # "Early Morning Wake Up Call" # "Communication Breakdown" # "Barking at the Moon" # "Downtown Too Long" # "Opera Singers" # "Midnight Man" # "On the Road" # "Look at That Woman Go" # "Fat Night" # "Believe in Yourself" ===2012 reissue bonus track=== 11. "Early Morning Wake Up Call (Instrumental version)" Category:1984 albums Category:Flash and the Pan albums
title: Early Morning Wake Up Call
